customer_reviews.text: I intended to just use this lotion for my hands but found how amazing it was for my feet. My wife has bought more expensive lotions for her feet and has replaced them with this one. Very impressed with how much they help prevent and heal cracked heels.
customer_reviews.author: E. Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: The BEST lotion there is!
customer_reviews.text: I am a loyal Eucerin customer. I've always had issues with my skin getting so dry that it cracked an bled. I have never had that issue since I started using Eucerin. (at least 15 years) This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki F.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is very thick. Only people with extremely dry skin should use it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayoung  JEONG

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: Skin was very dry, and Eucerin performed as advertised. The only issue is cost. There are a number of other similar products that are far less expensive. Will likely try one of them now that the condition seems under control.
customer_reviews.author: Shhhhhh

customer_reviews.title: Finally a lotion that works for me
customer_reviews.text: I live I the Mojave desert. the climate is ridiculously dry. I bought this to heal my dry hands and cracked feet. I could feel the improvement immediately and saw a noticeable difference after a few days. I use it twice a day after a shower and at night. It's a very powerful moisturizer but it doesn't leave me feeling sticky or greasy. I'm very happy I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the skin calming with oatmeal that is not what I received. I have had this one before and it does not work for me as well. Very disappointed! May be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jkb

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes my hands and feet very well
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes my hands and feet very well. Its too thick to my preference for my legs and arms, prefer a lighter lotion. But it has restored vitality and moisture to my hands which are very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: All day effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: This lotion has been the best for me -- it lathers on thick and really protects my skin all day. I like it more than others I've used. Not really effective for strong skin issues like eczema but will soothe it as its thick enough to "shield" the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bao & Nia

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper Brands work just as well
customer_reviews.text: Seriously overstated. This extremely exoensive cream does NOT perform any better than other brands which cost half the price. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion!
customer_reviews.text: My dr recommended this and I’ve been buying the Equate brand from Walmart but this is actually cheaper than that and I don’t have to go to Walmart! I’m a happy camper 8)
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: The Absolute Best
customer_reviews.text: My skin is softer when I use it. I even use it on my face sometimes to remove makeup as well as to moisturize my skin. My legs and heels love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great awesome
customer_reviews.text: Doctor recommended for my kid’s eczema. Works better than anything else on the market
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how well it works
customer_reviews.text: Recently suffered a severe knee injury and the doctor recommended it. My skin was extremely itchy following suture removal and lotion has worked amazingly well. More than what I was anticipating. Definitely worth the price. It doesn’t really have much of a scent, but I am very pleased with the way it moisturize my skin. It does leave my skin mildly greasy, but I don’t mind. Will be reordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mend

customer_reviews.title: AFTER TWO USES THE PUMP BROKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great but the pump stopped working after only two uses. Can't use the product without a working pump for hygiene purposes. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for very dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has REALLY dry skin. He didn’t think this would work because NOTHING has helped him. But it worked wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Torres

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good lotion...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good lotion but the review I read said it absorbed easily and I have found it to be a tad greasy and left a shiny residue on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Seasoned with Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: It leaves the skin a little bit greasy but it’s so moisturizing. I use it before bed and put pants on and it’s so problem. My skin feels great the next day
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed I have been getting rough patches on my arm which is a new thing and although my arms have been covered because of the weather I felt self-conscious about it, only after using this for a few days I've noticed a big difference. This isn't to thick or to thin just right and not greasy at all.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion ever for my psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: I have had psoriasis since birth, and Eucerin Intensive Repair lotion is by far the BEST lotion I've used for my skin. Some people think it is too rich/greasy, but it is just the kind of moisture my skin needs. If you have very dry skin/psoriasis, this is the best moisturizer! And - it is so much more affordable on Amazon than anywhere else I've found! Super win.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Armerding

customer_reviews.title: Best everyday body lotion
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly, readily absorbed. Pump makes it easy to get just the right amount. No scent which I prefer. Great for everyday use on the body especially after a shower. Use other products for face, hands, or overnight. Doesn’t stain.
customer_reviews.author: Critical consumer

customer_reviews.title: Moistures your skin very well.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cream for about 5 years, I don’t have anything bad to say. I buy it with no scent and I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Legend
